任務：一一檢查gmailAddress每個元素，若沒有寫“@gmail.com”則加上。

```{r}
gmailAddress <- c(
  "tim@gmail.com",
  "anita",
  "yellen@gmail.com",
  "huang@gmail.com"
)

library(stringr)

for(i in seq_along(gmailAddress)){
  if(!(str_detect(gmailAddress[[i]],"@gmali.com"))){
    gmailAddress[[i]] <- str_c(gmailAddress[[i]],"@gmali.com")
  }
}
gmailAddress
```
